member.name: T:Cake.Apprenda.ACSSettings
member.summary: Contains settings used by ACS Tool

member.name: T:Cake.Apprenda.ACS.BuildSettings
member.summary: Represents optional, common build settings for commands that can act on a Visual Studio solution

member.name: P:Cake.Apprenda.ACS.BuildSettings.RebuildSolution
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the solution should be rebuilt before packaging

member.name: P:Cake.Apprenda.ACS.BuildSettings.Configuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the configuration for which to build the solution

member.name: P:Cake.Apprenda.ACS.BuildSettings.IgnoreFilters
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of file extensions that should be excluded from the final package. ex) -filters ".sln .obj .foo" - Will exclude files with the extensions .sln, .obj, and .foo

member.name: P:Cake.Apprenda.ACS.BuildSettings.UserInterfaceProjects
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of project names that should be treated as UI projects. ex) -i "SubApp1 PrimaryApp SubApp2" - Specifies PrimaryApp, SubApp1, and SubApp2 as the UI projects.

member.name: P:Cake.Apprenda.ACS.BuildSettings.UserInterfaceRoot
member.summary:
Gets or sets the user interface root.
Specifies the primary user interface project. ex) -i "SubApp1 PrimaryApp SubApp2" -PrivateRoot PrimaryApp Specifies PrimaryApp, SubApp1, and SubApp2 as the user interface projects with PrimaryApp as the root UI. When published on Apprenda, the root UI will be accessible at the application's url with virtual applications SubApp1 and SubApp2 underneath it.

member.name: P:Cake.Apprenda.ACS.BuildSettings.WcfProjects
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of project names that should be treated as WCF service projects. ex) -s "Service1 Service2" - Specifies Service1 and Service2 as the WCF service projects.

member.name: P:Cake.Apprenda.ACS.BuildSettings.WindowsServiceProjects
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of project names that should be treated as Windows service projects. ex) -ws "Service1 Service2" - Specifies Service1 and Service2 as the Windows service projects.

member.name: P:Cake.Apprenda.ACS.BuildSettings.StoredProcedureProjects
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of project names that should be treated as CLR stored procedure projects. ex) -StoredProcs "Project1 Project2" - Specifies Project1 and Project 2 as CLR stored procedure projects.

member.summary: Gets or sets a concretely defined set of parameters.This argument should be the last argument of the ProvisionAddOn command since it will assume that the remaining information is part of this argument. The way to specify each parameter is as follows: -param1 "value1" -param2 "value2"...
